lead_paragraph: Mr. Drumm, whose bank was at the center of a banking scandal, was arrested in Massachusetts, but charges were not disclosed.

headline.main: David Drumm, Ex-Chief of Anglo Irish Bank, Is Arrested
headline.print_headline: Ex-Chief of Irish Bank Is Arrested

snippet: Mr. Drumm, whose bank was at the center of a banking scandal, was arrested in Massachusetts, but charges were not disclosed.
